recipe.title: Tortilla-Crusted Tilapia
ingredients: 1 jalapeño, stemmed, seeded, and finely diced
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°. Lightly grease a baking sheet or line with parchment paper. Sprinkle lime juice on both sides of fish, then season both sides with salt and pepper. Stir together tortilla chips and cayenne on a plate. Beat egg in a bowl. Dip each fillet in egg, then roll in chips. Place each coated fillet on prepared baking sheet. Bake for 15-17 minutes, or until fish flakes. While fish is baking, make tartar sauce: Mix together mayonnaise, jalapeño, garlic, cilantro, and lime juice. Season to taste with salt. Serve with cooked fish.
